name: 2048 Collection: Fantasy
description:
More Varied Gameplay
Many game modes available:
- Classic mode
- 3 × 3 , 5 × 5 , 8 × 8
- Vampire
- Tarot
- Color blocks
- Invert mode
- Quick mode
- Greek myth
- ……
- ……

Core rules:
Slide your fingers to move the tiles, when tiles of same number meet,they will be melt into new tile,which will also make the number to be added automatically.
New tile with number will appear randomly in the grid after each move. Use strategies to get higher numbers, but avoiding the grids to be filled, the final goal is to get 2048!
